FuncDef: The display ospf bfd session command displays information about a BFD-enabled neighbor. The display ospf bfd session command displays information about a BFD-enabled neighbor.

ParaDef.Info:
process-id Specifies the ID of an OSPF process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays all the interfaces that are enabled with BFD in the OSPF process.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the router ID of a neighbor.
Dotted decimal notation.
